title: STT: Local worker to merge chunks and upload to GCS
description: Implement local worker service to download Supabase chunks, merge/remux into a single file (ffmpeg), upload to GCS, and return gs:// URI.

title: STT: Supabase Storage bucket + signed upload URL endpoint
description: Create Supabase Storage bucket for audio uploads and implement server action/route to mint signed upload URLs (supports large files).

title: STT: longRunningRecognize start + status polling endpoints
description: Add server endpoints to start Google STT longRunningRecognize using gs:// URI and to poll operation status; persist results into transcripts.

title: STT: Client direct upload (resumable/chunk) + progress UI
description: Update audio recorder/upload flow to send large files directly to Supabase Storage (resumable or chunked) and show upload progress + processing state.

title: STT: GCS temp file cleanup + failure recovery
description: Ensure temporary GCS objects are deleted after STT completion/failure; add retry/recovery handling for upload and merge failures.
